channel.title: minlib RSS Feed
channel.description: Updates, particularly software updates, about the minlib text-interface personal library management software.

item.title: v0.97 Released
item.description: v0.97 is an updated release of minlib. It introduces printing results to the screen, rather than always using the TUI (the -p option) and printing statistics about the library (the -s option).

item.title: v0.9 Released
item.description: v0.9 is the first production version of minlib. It includes full extraction of metadata from a library; writing to a library file; customizable format strings; detail view; opening of files; and full-text search of entries.
